name: Fumpers
description:
Fumpers?
Your goal is to complete the track by jumping.
Let's See How Quick You Can Be at Doing This.
The game tries to annoy you with annoying traps and the sound of the devil's laughter every time you die.
No registration system, try not to die.
Each time you die, you will enter more experienced next time.
The Slavic God Svarog Statue is watching you from the corner of the game.
Try to reach your house safely by jumping from the platforms.
There is no rule that the shortcut will always be hard.
Svarog has moved some platforms for you and put some high bouncing nuts in some places, don't forget to evaluate.
Do not get angry and try to finish the game without closing it.
